nodes.text: Palek was an astronomical object inhabited by the Palekians and known for its hyperstorms. In 85 BBY, the Jedi Padawan Sifo-Dyas visited Palek with his Master Lene Kostana, witnessing a hyperstorm and acquiring a crystal that appeared similar to kyber, which he gave to his friend Dooku upon returning to the Jedi Temple on Coruscant.
Palek was first mentioned in the audiobook Dooku: Jedi Lost, written by Cavan Scott and published in 2019. The spelling of Palek's name was given in the script of the audiobook.
